cellar.description: You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading north, and a crawlway to the south. On the west is the bottom of a steep metal ramp which is unclimbable.
cellar.darkDescription: It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.

actions.examine ramp: The ramp is made of smooth metal and is too steep to climb.

wine cellar.description: This appears to be a wine cellar. Empty wine bottles line the walls. A narrow staircase leads up, and a passage leads north.
wine cellar.darkDescription: It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.

actions.examine bottles: The bottles are covered in dust and appear very old.

take bottle.message: You find one unbroken bottle of rare vintage wine!

coal bin.description: This is a small room which appears to be a coal bin. A chute enters from above and the room exits to the east.
coal bin.darkDescription: It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.

actions.examine coal: There are a few lumps of coal here.

take coal.message: You pick up a lump of coal.

tool room.description: This appears to be a storage room for tools. Rusty implements line the walls. A passage leads south.
tool room.darkDescription: It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.

actions.examine tools: Most of the tools are too rusty to be useful.

take wrench.message: You find a sturdy wrench that's still in good condition.

old storage room.description: This appears to be an old storage room. Wooden crates and barrels fill the space. A passage leads west.
old storage room.darkDescription: It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.

actions.examine crates: The crates are old and falling apart.

open barrel.message: Inside one barrel you find some old coins!

secret passage.description: This is a narrow secret passage that connects parts of the cellar. Cobwebs hang from the ceiling.
secret passage.darkDescription: It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.
